publishing_focus.primary_focus: Bilingual Spanish-English literary fiction and non-fiction
publishing_focus.target_audience: Spanish and English-speaking readers seeking to immerse in both cultures through literature
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our carefully curated, engaging bilingual content helps readers effortlessly transition between languages, promoting cultural understanding and language proficiency.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Contemporary Latin American authors, English translations of Spanish classics, bilingual editions of popular English language novels
